component.name: UniShellect
component.summary: Load a menu of shells/files/commands from any console.

description.p: This is a command line interface utility that creates a menu from a JSON configuration file allowing a user to load any shell, interpreter, file, or command with arguments. This program allows you to load custom config files and has various exit codes and exit code supression. This is highly customizable and can be used in so many ways. This is a very lightweight utility written in Fortran and is cross-platform for Linux and Windows making this a truly universal shell selector.
